item.title: Israel announces limited reopening of Rafah Crossing under Trumpâ€™s 20-point plan
item.description: Netanyahu agrees to reopen Gaza's Rafah crossing under President Trump's 20-point peace plan, pending the recovery of the final Israeli hostage.

item.title: Denmark's prime minister insists sovereignty is non-negotiable as Trump announces Greenland deal 'framework'
item.description: Denmark's prime minister said she won't negotiate her nation's sovereignty after President Donald Trump said a "framework" on a Greenland deal was reached.
